page.title: 04SCHOOLWORK
page.content: Schoolwork is different in different schools. I interviewed Sarah Elkins who used to go to Pinhoe Middle school and she says it was very different . She used to do scripture and copy writing off of the board . In P.E she had to listen to a tape and do what it said. In assembley instead of a teacher telling them a story she had to listen to a tape with stories on. {OUR SCHOOLWORK DIVIDED INTO { PERCENTAGE TERMS } Maths =33\% English =25% Assembley=8\% Art =4% P.E =8\% Drama =21% {DESCRIPTION OF OUR CLASSROOM We have tables and chairs to work on, two libary sections in a corner and work on the walls.The teacher's desk is in the middle of one wall with a blackboard behind it. {By Louise Parkin.}
